PlanetJSON.Name: A Island
PlanetJSON.Creator: Kristin Agcaoili, Vicki Intara, Nisha Yerunkar, Jenny Wong
PlanetJSON.Description: You are shipwrecked on an island in the middle of the ocean. Can you survive and escape with nothing but the clothes on your back and items you can find?
